creator: shannon.haworth@gmail.com
text:
The page: http://ant.apache.org/external.html has a link to an "Image" task.  However all links return with 404 errors.  The contact field for this task is http://www.mullassery.com/ which also returns a 404 error.  

It appears that this task is no longer available.  I suppose the 404 error could be transient, due to a data loss.  However, I suspect the author has abandoned this project.  A search of related bugs turns up the following, which seems to support my suspicions.  

https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=23829#c1

I recommend that the Images section be removed from the external tools section of the documentation.
is removed in svn now, will vanish from the website soon.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
